name: no-direct-http-param-to-dangerous-functions
description: No instances were found where HTTP request parameters were directly passed to dangerous functions (such as system). All identified system calls were using hardcoded command strings.
notes: Although no direct command injection vulnerabilities were identified, it is recommended to review the execution context of these hardcoded commands to ensure they cannot be exploited. Further analysis of the HTTP request handling process is required.
